definition: to no avail/achieving nothing/totally ineffective/to have no effect/to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: I tried losing weight,but nothing wored.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试着减肥，但是毫无效果。

sentences.english: They protested to the President but in vain.
sentences.chinese: 他们向董事长提抗议，但毫无效果。

sentences.english: I tried losing heaviness, but naught worked.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试擆减肥，但是毫无效果。

sentences.english: I tried losing weight， but nothing worked.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试着减肥，但是毫无效果。

sentences.english: Other manufacturers' approaches, meanwhile, smack of helplessness.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，其他厂商采取的办法则毫无效果。

definition: no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
to return without any achievement (idiom); to go home with one's tail between one's legs
lit. to follow the recipe (idiom)/fig. to follow a set pattern
lit. to scratch the outside of the boot (idiom)/fig. beside the point/ineffectual
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
